title: This is the future of banking
text: Big banks need to take notes. With Monzo I can see all my accounts in one place, move money between accounts, track spending across accounts, and use their budgeting tools to help me save. Love this app.

title: Excellent for seeing spending across cards
text:
Monzo is a super helpful bank and way to manage your money overall.

It‚Äôs really easy to link multiple credit cards and set a target for my monthly spending that takes into account all my credit cards plus my debit card.

Also, separating your balance into several smaller sub-accounts (‚Äúpots‚Äù) that you can name is surprisingly useful, and setting up specific merchants to spend from certain pots makes it a lot easier to stay on top of my budget.

title: Love the pots!
text: Having moved to the US from the UK, I was really excited to find Monzo here. The ability to sort money and pay bills from pots is the best!

title: Keeps getting better and better!
text:
My favorite feature is not having to remember my password to log in. The UI is amazing. 

I can see all of my credit cards and bank accounts in one place. It‚Äôs my go to travel card because of the no foreign fees, no ATM fees, and the ability to spend from the ‚Äúvacation‚Äù pot I created and saved for all year. 

Highly recommend!

title: Love the app!
text: Love how easy it is to use! Love the colors and pots.

title: Love it
text: Best money management APP!

title: I love Monzo!
text: With Monzo I‚Äôm able to manage all of my monthly expenses, manage and track my spending, and work towards my savings goals. I love the salary sorter feature to automatically allocate my paycheck to my goals and expenses!

title: Getting better each quarter!
text: The app features are getting better every 6 months or so, but I can‚Äôt wait until it‚Äôs more competitive with other offerings on the market so that I can use it more

title: Zero customer service
text: STAY AWAY! Had some fraud on my account and after reporting it, Monzo froze my account and wouldn‚Äôt issue a new debit card until the dispute process concluded, aka 75 days. Luckily, I was able to transfer my remaining funds to a new account but if I hadn‚Äôt, my money would have been held hostage. Stay AWAY! Customer service was like speaking to a robot. You can‚Äôt call them. You can only ‚Äúchat‚Äù. They give minimal information and don‚Äôt care whether you‚Äôre taken care of or not. STAY AWAY

title: The field ‚Äòname_type‚Äô is required

title: Limited address locator
text: When you signup with Monzo app it asks for your address, and unlike others they don‚Äôt provide a way to enter but a lookup functionality. The problem that this lookup is limited and doesn‚Äôt seem to know new buildings, as our building is just 4 years old and they have a wrong information about it. I was hoping that after the signup I would be able to correct the address manually, but it turns out that they don‚Äôt give access to the account until you activate the card. Which is now sent to an incorrect address. It‚Äôs a limbo.

title: Nevada not an option
text: My daughter told me I should use this because she loves it. Well I went to sign up and Nevada is not listed in the states, even though my daughter was able to sign up a few months ago. Guess I‚Äôm sticking with what I have.

title: Update to my account being frozen
text: Previously I posted a review of Monzo when they had frozen my account with all my money in it and no response. A few hours later I reached the UK Monzo who explained it was under review and they would let me know when they are done. Well ir suddenly hit me It's because I founded my account with my other banks debit card for $2k and my account less than a month ago. But they couldn't confirm if it's what caused my account being reviewed. So I sent them a picture of the debit card I used to pay with and my driver's license. Less than one hour later my account was unfroze. NOW I LOVE MONZO! and the fact I can add funds from my other debit cards (only mine) much easier to move funds quickly when I'm traveling to avoid the foreign transaction fees and Monzo works worldview no foreign transaction fees. Plus they can be linked to your banks via plaid. Thanks Monzo for changing my mind completely about your bank

title: Keeps disabling Touch ID

title: Would have gotten 5
text: Dude! Would have gotten 5 stars, but I was wearing headphones right after listening to music, and still hadn‚Äôt taken them off. It was a mild volume setting but I got a notification that I received some money and it freaking blew up my ears. It was like after a concert where everything seems quiet after that and the world seems far away. Definitely should be fixed so it doesn‚Äôt shock people or damage their hearing!
I love the App the only thing I don't like is how long it takes to transfer and receive money

title: Amazing for Budgeting and Traveling
text: Features that I love in Monzo after using it more than a year are instant notifications every time I spend on my Monzo card, the bright neon card color, connecting my other banks and credit cards so that I can see all of my transactions in one place. Custom categories are a life saver as they allow me to see exactly where my money is going! And Monzo is always the card that I take traveling when I‚Äôm abroad for no fees on card spend and ATM withdrawals. Their customer service are also quick to respond and super helpful! Would highly recommend!

title: Unreliable
text: Ordered a card, didn‚Äôt arrive. Need to change the address since I‚Äôm moving flats and can‚Äôt do that in the app because the app is useless until your card arrives. I‚Äôve heard the service is great which is why I was inclined to use it in the first place but setting it up has become almost unbearable. I now understand why banks have physical locations or at least humans to interact with. Calling and having to go through 5 steps just to be put on hold 10 minutes to then have to restate why you‚Äôre calling and then being told to send an email is ridiculous.

title: Monzo stole my money - beware!

title: Fraud
text: I caution those who are thinking of banking with Monzo. First I tried for over a month to call the bank about fraud on my account. Their number outs on hold and then disconnects after a few minutes. I then notified them of the fraud via their app. Without investigating they then proceeded to close my account and blocked my access. The money remaining in the account was never transferred not to mention losing thousabds to fraud in which Monzo refused to do anything but retaliate.

title: Great so far

title: Beware!
text: Do not get this app. Do not do this trap. The in app customer service is inefficient. They are extremely unresponsive. This is via email and their preferred in app chat service. Your signup process will be inexplicably delayed and any information you‚Äôve provided will become their property ‚Äúfor a few years( the exact timeline can vary depending on specific details of your signup)‚Äù. They have all of your information but YOU can never reach them in a reasonable amount of time. Just save yourself the time and stress and DO NOT sign up for this.

title: Can't add to second apple pay wallet? Logs out other devices
text: I originally downloaded this onto my ipad to save space on my phone (200+MB) but later learned that ipad has a separate apple pay wallet so adding there doesn't put the card on my phone wallet. So I deleted that and installed on the iphone but now every time I click to add to apple pay it briefly shows an error message and then goes back to the screen before I clicked to add. Meanwhile it logged me out of the ipad and I have to log back in there too try to add back to ipad wallet. But can't add to ipad wallet either. Like the option has been removed after one use. Maybe it takes a few days to refresh. Still annoying.

title: Terrible use Revolut instead
text: The sign up process for Monzo was a mess and I was denied even though I have excellent credit and a job that pays over six figures. I was given no explanation to why either. I went Revolut and was instantly approved.

title: Fraud
text: Idk how but my account got hacked and the person CONTINUOUSLY tried to charge my account every day even after I reported it. Fortunately I only had $47 in my account at the time but they took $45 of it and then continued to try to charge my account with 7-800 dollar purchases. I had to call the UK to get my problem resolved and that cost a FORTUNE on my cellphone plan. There really is no good side to this bank, I do NOT recommend.

title: Denied - no explanation
text: Applied for a card submitted everything they ask for - have excellent credit but denied and they say they can‚Äôt tell me why. Smh.

title: Started off good, now missing funds
text:
I really like the interface. I previously had simple and did think monzo was similar and a good replacement. I don‚Äôt like that the notifications don‚Äôt tell you your current balance, but ok.  
However, recently I placed an Amazon order for $300, that I then canceled. Amazon does what‚Äôs called a ‚Äúpending authorization‚Äù. Monzo is still holding onto the funds from that transaction, and this was 2 weeks ago. I‚Äôve contacted Amazon, and they confirmed the pending authorization was canceled and it‚Äôs up to the bank to make the funds available. Monzo says it‚Äôs up to Amazon; but I‚Äôve never had this problem before, typically I receive a refund within a day or two. 
I also had a grocery pick up order, where I had accidentally put the wrong billing address, and it showed as declined. However the funds were still removed from my account, even though it says ‚Äúdeclined‚Äù right next to the transaction. I had to order again, essentially paying twice. I really don‚Äôt like not having access to my funds, this isn‚Äôt a problem I‚Äôve ever had before. 2 weeks is too long to be holding onto money. I suppose that‚Äôs what you get for being in the US using a bank that originated in the UK. 
I never write reviews, but I‚Äôm so annoyed I just had to. I‚Äôll be switching banks.

title: Review
text: Good

title: Great and getting better
text: I love the Monzo team for the way they think about money. Monzo is not just a banking app, it‚Äôs a budgeting app. It does so much more than an average banking app would do, and everything it does, it does truly great. There are certain features that any bank has, but Monzo doesn‚Äôt. That‚Äôs something that is a little disappointing, but I still prefer this over the other options. I appreciate that they are continuing to develop it.
